RG 7.1. Office of the Senior VP University Development and Alumni Giving
New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera
New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera

NYU Alumni & Friends Connect is a monthly newsletter for New York University Alumni and others associated with New York University. The articles include student profiles, alumni profiles, alumni events, alumni benefits, awards, and other news from the university and New York City. The newsletter dates back to 2016.
NYU Alumni & Friends Connect Archived Website: August 2022-ongoing
